ItemTooltips.ring_of_protection: Gives good early survivabilty, will be upgraded.
ItemTooltips.cloak: Gives you protection form magic and will be upgraded later.
ItemTooltips.magic_wand: Get this early on agsint teams that cast a lot of spell.
ItemTooltips.clarity: Gets lots of these so you can use spells very often.
ItemTooltips.flask: Good heal when you are low.
ItemTooltips.tango: Helps heal up after you get harassed.
ItemTooltips.mekansm: Get this if your team does not already have one.
ItemTooltips.vladmir: A good aura for the team.
ItemTooltips.ring_of_basilius: Gives you good early Mana regen, turn it off while you are in lane.
ItemTooltips.pipe: Protects the team from magic damage.
ItemTooltips.sheepstick: A very powerful item but expensive.
ItemTooltips.vanguard: Get this if you want more HP, if you do get it get it early.
ItemTooltips.blade_mail: Get this with high HP to deal damage to those who attack you.
ItemTooltips.arcane_boots: Provides good Mana for you and the team.
ItemTooltips.rod_of_atos: A very good slow and give HP as well and more Mana.
ItemTooltips.heavens_halberd: Helps you stay alive and counters enemy carries.

AbilityTooltips.undying_decay: Cast this very often in lane to harass a lot and give yourself HP. In team fights hit as many enemies as often as you can with this.
AbilityTooltips.undying_soul_rip: Not good until you are in team fights so get it later on. Use it to heal allies and hurt enemies.
AbilityTooltips.undying_tombstone: A very strong spell, use it in lane when you are ganked or are trying to kill the other team. Use it in every team fight you can.
AbilityTooltips.undying_flesh_golem: Use this in team fights and try to stay close to the enemy.
AbilityTooltips.attribute_bonus: No need to take this until you have to.
